text: Avondance is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in northern France. ==Geography== A tiny village situated some 15 miles (24 km) east of Montreuil- sur-Mer, on the D154 road, the source of the small river Planquette. ==Population== ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file ==External links== Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Avondance
